name: Biryani
description: Biryani is a spiced rice dish with meat or vegetables, known for its rich flavors and aromatic spices.

name: Burger
description: A sandwich consisting of a cooked patty, usually beef, placed inside a sliced bun, often with various toppings.

name: Noodles
description: Long, thin strips of dough, often boiled and served with sauces, vegetables, or meats in various cuisines.

name: Pizza
description: An Italian dish of a round, flat base of dough topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings.

name: North Indian
description: Cuisine featuring rich, creamy curries, tandoori dishes, and a variety of bread like naan and roti.

name: Chinese
description: Diverse cuisine known for stir-fries, noodles, dumplings, and dishes with bold flavors and unique sauces.
